segments.text: A tough job . They even offer in-service training every Wednesday afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't like it . I am not used to this kind of 9 to 5 work hours . Above all , I hate talking to those poker faces everyday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you have to take the bad with the good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess so . I am badly off and I need this job .
segments.speaker: S2
